work.name: Shein

work.name: Georgia Institute of Technology
work.summary: Conducting research in computer vision and AI
highlights: Hyper-spectral 3d reconstruction method using Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs)
Gaussian Splatting based methods for robust Multi-channel novel view rendering
Diffusion based methods using trajectory based priors for brushstroke rendering

work.name: Fastcode AI
work.summary: Computer vision problems for autonomous drones
highlights: Development and deployment of high accuracy and low latency models for inventory mapping using live UAV feeds

work.summary: Worked on various computer vision projects

Image Stitching, Image Matching for agriculture-based insights
